creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red and white vertically striped huipil with multicolored (predominantly red) embroidery; embroidery consists of geometric shapes including diamonds, zig zags, and chevrons, as well as animal motifs; huipil's neck opening is uncut; sides of huipil are completely open
title: Uncut sobra huipil
